data.title: Drought assistance
data.excerpt: Si tiene un pozo seco y necesitaría asistencia en Español, llame gratis (844) 903-2800.  If you need water If you need bottled or hauled water, your county’s Office of Emergency Services (OES) can help. The state funds county response to drought-related water shortages.  Emergency water is available to households, small water systems, and community water … Read more
data.author: Peggy Gartin

_genesis_description: If you need bottled or hauled water, your county's Office of Emergency Services can help. Also see information on small community grants.

site_settings.site_description: Learn more about current conditions, the state’s response and informational resources available to the public.
